about_the_game:
A mysterious post discovered on a Japanese internet forum.

"7 Days Shrine" - an ancient ritual said to grant any wish without fail.

It speaks of a tradition of visiting an old Shinto shrine deep in the Japanese mountains for seven consecutive days.

However, the "7 Days Shrine" ritual has rules that must be followed:

  • Continue your shrine visits for seven consecutive days

  • Do not leave the mountain during the ritual

  • Do not let yourself be seen by anyone

  • Do not look into the darkness

Are you prepared to undertake the 7 Days Shrine ritual?

▼Features

"7 Days Shrine" is a short walking simulator.

For seven days, you'll traverse mountain paths and pay your respects at the shrine.

As each day passes, anxiety and fear slowly consume you.

What awaits you on the seventh day...?

Discover the truth with your own eyes.
